channel.title: CVE Feed for WP Travel -- WP Travel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WP Travel -- WP Travel

item.title: CVE-2024-44039|2024-10-07T12:28:52.829Z -- wp%20travel -- wp%20travel
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Travel allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Travel: from n/a through 9.3.1.
